basics.name: Aarjith Nandakumar
basics.label: Frontend Engineer and UI designer
basics.summary: Aspiring to build digital products where I can apply my creative skills and provide innovative solutions using latest and greatest of front end technologies.

location.address: 4B/201 Doshi Etopia 1, 3rd Panchayat Link Road, Perungudi

highlights: Tasked with reimagining suite of enterprise apps for collaboration and learning.
Developed standalone web clients for desktop with Angular / React and converted them as progressive web apps.
Developed Hybrid apps for iOS and Android using Ionic / Cordova framework.
Won a digital hackathon by developing chatbot based hybrid app.

work.summary: Frontend engineer for a digital insurance platform
highlights: Developed inhouse javascript components integrating REST APIs and Adobe Experience Manager CMS frontend.
Involved in accessibility review and enhancement for the application.
Introduced test driven development approach for javascript components using Jasmine testing framework.
Worked in an Agile team, participated and conducted scrum.

work.summary: Moved to research and development in the domain of social media applications
highlights: Involved in UX design and accessibility review of an enterprise social network.
Developed frontend for a digital social CRM platform.
Designed and developed an Intranet portal on Sharepoint for a customer.

work.summary: Worked as an interface developer for a global banking client
highlights: Translated business requirements to effective interface design blueprints.
Involved in design, coding, unit testing and support lifecycles.
Designed and developed a team collaboration site in Sharepoint.
Collaborated with multiple teams in diverse locations.

awards.title: Best Team
awards.summary: For succesful implementation of digital learning solution mobile app.

awards.title: Engage Award
awards.summary: For the commitment and dedication shown in delivering the project ontime.

awards.title: BPS Champions League - Team
awards.summary: Excellent performance from the team. Well beyond commitment and excellence on the deliveries.

awards.title: On the Spot Award
awards.summary: Was key member in Jan 2014 release implementation. The quality of work was very well received and appreciated by clients.

awards.title: Certificate Of Appreciation
awards.summary: Selected as National team award for successful completion of SAS projects.
